places.name: India Gate
places.description: A war memorial dedicated to the soldiers who died in World War I.

places.name: Red Fort
places.description: A historic fort that served as the main residence of the Mughal emperors.

places.name: Qutub Minar
places.description: A UNESCO World Heritage Site and the tallest brick minaret in the world.

places.name: Lotus Temple
places.description: A Bahá'í House of Worship known for its distinctive lotus-shaped architecture.

places.name: Humayun's Tomb
places.description: A UNESCO World Heritage Site and the tomb of the Mughal Emperor Humayun.

places.name: Connaught Place
places.description: A major commercial and financial hub, known for its Georgian-style architecture.

places.name: Dilli Haat
places.description: An open-air market offering a variety of handicrafts, food, and cultural performances.

places.name: ISBT Kashmere Gate
places.description: A major inter-state bus terminal in Delhi.
